website_summaries.verdict: This bag's quality and durability are top-notch, but several less expensive options perform just as well.
pros: Garners praise for its ultra-comfortable straps and stress-free clean up
cons: Priced higher than many competitors that offer similar value

customer_reviews.title: Huge Bag, One Big Minus in Carry Options
customer_reviews.text: I loved my BFF, but with #2 on the way, I needed something larger. This bag fits the bill perfectly, however I really wish it was also a backpack convertible like the BFF. The tote straps are too short to put on your shoulder, and a fully loaded bag is quite heavy on one shoulder like a crossover messenger. I'll probably convert mine to utilize the backpack straps off of my BFF to get more functionality.
customer_reviews.author: LWaloski

customer_reviews.title: Pros definitely beat a single Con!
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this product: the price - I got it while it was on sale so I only paid almost half the original price The design - so many pockets and compartments useful for any mommy wanting to make sure all her kids' things are complete, plus her own. Makes everything organized and easy to access. There is even a changing pad included! Size - big enough to carry everything and even some Material - strong and durable, can take a beating Fabric design - nice and colorful, very vibrant and cheerful What I don't like - full price is steep
customer_reviews.author: PCF

customer_reviews.title: Great weekender bag for your little one!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter over two years ago. My granddaughter’s items fit in it perfectly when she goes to visit her dad. The bag doesn’t get the best treatment when it is in dad’s possession, but the bag is holding up superbly!! Colors are still beautiful, stitching is holding up wonderfully, and it gets the job done. Perfect for short visits to accommodate clothing, snacks, a few toys/books and anything else you may be able to imagine. Extremely spacious.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've been using this for about a month ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've been using this for about a month for one kiddo, bought it to prepare for the two I'll have soon. The overall colors and design I like. I feel like the large should strap could be wider and more substantial though I haven't had any problems with it. The amount of pockets and storage is phenomenal. I can pack it up with plenty of cloth diapers, extra outfits and various trimmings for a long day out with room to spare. The front storage space I tuck my personal items into and then I ditch my purse. The changing pad it came with is great, has a nice cushion to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Smartly designed bag
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for an extended vacation with my one year old. The bag stayed organized and the front "Mommy" compartment was handy for my important things and travel docs. The bag does tip forward even with nothing in it. This doesn't bother me, but I could see it annoying some people to not have a balanced bag. I bought the bag in black and it's fine. Neutral and probably useful after the baby stage is over, but it's definitely not the most stylish diaper bag. For my purposes, function won over form, so this bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rlp165

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Traveling with Baby
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable. Fit everything baby needed for a week away and even some stuff for mommy! Love the compartments and the silver inner liner. Handles are strong and the shoulder strap is great. Used this as a carry on bag and it still looks like new. Love the metal feet on the bottom of the bag. A little large for my day to day bag but is great when we are going on an extended trip. If you have multiple kiddos this would be a great bag to pack everything they could need for a day out and about.
customer_reviews.author: lissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Bag Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper bag ever! I have two kids under 2 and I can carry diapers, wipes, food, sippy cup, formula, bottles, change of clothes for two, burp clothes, bibs and have room to spare! Mommy pocket has a designated spot for cell phone, another for sunglasses, another for lip gloss/toiletries, and room to spare as well. The material is durable and easy to clean. If you have two kids (or just like to pack a lot) then this bag is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Love this diaper bag for our two kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag for our two kids. After having a new baby and a toddler, you realize you need tons of room and this bag has it! There are lots of pockets and compartments and great accessories to buy along with it. It can be a little heavy but most of the time we have a stroller with and use the stroller clips. Watch the videos and see if it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: katie o

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. LOVE. I have a toddler and I'm about to have another baby. Lots of space for both of their things and enough room to keep it organized. I'm an over packer, as well, so that's saying something. I love the material, super easy to clean and the crumb holes are brilliant! When it is time to down grade to a smaller bag, I'll definitely be getting another Ju-Ju-Be bag. I see why everyone raves about them now.
customer_reviews.author: R2D2

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and Heavy but Stylish
customer_reviews.text: This bag can fit a bunch of stuff in it. But it is heavy and bulky. I only use is to pack and just leave it in the car because if I hang it on any of my strollers it tips them over. Great quality and very pretty, just doesn't function the way I'd like it to.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Super Large Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Fleurville Mothership and it was not any larger than the standard bags one can find at BabysRus or Target. The Be Prepared bag is awesomely large and very useful for parents of twins or multiple children. It really is huge and I can fit Everything I need in it. I also love that it is water resistant, washable, fashionable, and lots of useful pockets. Really am SO happy that I bought it after doing loads of research. Thanks again Amazon for another great find!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a diaper bag for twins. I'm able to fit everything I need into this bag without over stuffing it. The seams, zips and fabric of the bag seems to be high quality and will stand up to wear and tear. Inside there are handly compartments to keep things organized. I can actually fit my pumpinstyle backpack inside the diaper bag. I highly recommend this bag if you have more than one infant.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Bought as recommended for twins
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, haven’t yet gotten a chance to use it. I’m preparing and haven’t yet delivered.
customer_reviews.author: maria d.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bag for 2 under 2 but barely fits in my stroller storage area!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for organizing all of the things you need for 2 under 2. Unfortunately I had to return this because I needed it to fit in the storage area better.. Once my youngest is a little taller he wouldn't have enough room for his legs and we wouldn't be able to recline his seat. Sadly, I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bijou9

customer_reviews.title: Its not a white bag!! Its grey
customer_reviews.text: I would've given a 5 star but the color was not white as it appears in the pics. They bag is GREY. Still very nice but not too happy with the color.
customer_reviews.author: sheila g

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it is beautiful, unique and great quality. I use it as my weekend/overnight bag to pack baby/kid stuff. It is a bit too big to just carry around daily as a diaper bag, i have a smaller one for that. But this bag is my favorite as it can fit in so many things and it's eye-catching!
customer_reviews.author: taikaz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Best for those needing lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Best for those needing lots of room. Several pockets which makes it easy to organize. Sturdy construction. When bought with the stroller clips it is very manageable. Only flaw is that the color fades in the sunlight, so in time it looks more brown than black.
customer_reviews.author: alison mulderrig

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag!!! I bought one then my dog ate part of it and I bought another. This bag is HUGE but LIGHTWEIGHT. It's amazing. It fits everything and more. Love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but huge bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really big but is great for trips, and I keep it in my car for longer trips and meals at restaurants, and to restock my smaller diaper bag. The fabric is awesome just like all my other JuJuBe bags and the organization features are wonderful. I like it better than my BFF because I needed a bigger Mommy pocket, and I wanted tote straps. I only wish they were a smidge longer. Its a little awkward to slide onto my shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Enormous
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for long outings and multiple kids. I thought I needed a bag this large for regular use, I was wrong. The bag is great quality, I love the "mom" pocket/section and the high quality materials. No complaints, other than my own mistake.
customer_reviews.author: UnrequitedDream

customer_reviews.title: i have used this diaper bad now for sometime and let me tell you it ...
customer_reviews.text: i have used this diaper bad now for sometime and let me tell you it was worth EVERY penny spent minimal signs of wear and tear and have been using it for over a yr! i pack for 3 small children in it and still have plenty of room. I LOVE THIS BAG!!!
customer_reviews.author: sandy collura

customer_reviews.title: Blows my old bag away
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is phenomenal. I just had my second baby while my first is turning 2. This bag has plenty of room for everything that I need for both girls with plenty of pockets to allow for organization at the same time. The bag is well designed, well made, and super cute, too. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a large diaper bag that they plan to clip onto a stroller, etc. Fully loaded it would be too heavy to carry around on your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: Got it for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much... I use it as an adult duffle bag. I went to the north shore for 4 days and brought this bag. It keeps everything so organized with all the pockets. No packing cubes required! Bottle pocket on side holds my travel chi hair dryer. Other bottle pocket held bug spray, sunscreen and stain spray. Front pocket holds toiletries. Slim pocket holds kindle, ipad and magazines. Main compartment holds clothes, pjs, everything else needed. Back slim pocket holds my towel. You can carry it with either handle, made out of durable material. I just love jujube! I love anything organized and contained!
customer_reviews.author: jojobean

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much. When I am done using it as a diaper bag I will make it an over night bag.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Best Bag EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly content with this bag. It is very spacious and perfect for an over packer like myself. It definitely has some weight to it empty and even more being over packed but I don't mind it at all. Not like I carry it all the time. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but bulky - better for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag exclusively for traveling. It fits all of my daughter's clothes, toys, diapers and other essentials. It's way too big for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Copper Turquoise

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful print and lots of space for travel
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for my daughter.. Wonderful print and lots of space for travel..Looking out for a reasonably priced Bubble Trouble in Ju ju be!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa LL

customer_reviews.title: Tore at the seams in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed at the quality of this product. The bag looks great but the shoulder strap tore out of the side in 3 weeks with moderate usage. I believe this speaks directly to the overall quality on this product and I am including a picture for customer review.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J LeCour

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then I expected super cute and durable I do recommend getting the smaller one for quick trips out this one barley fits in the bottom of my stroller
customer_reviews.author: Krista S

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEE
customer_reviews.text: so much space!!! love it!!!! I have two kids and there is still plenty of room for more! my husband said I will never need that much space! well when I always come prepared and we needed things he finally said ok I guess you were right you can pack anything in that thing and be prepared!!
customer_reviews.author: nellbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cloth diapering
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for the perfect bag and think this is it! We cloth diaper which means we carry bigger/bulkier diapers as well as dirty diapers. This is worth the health and cost savings, but means we need a big bag. This bag is huge, and has tons of pockets. I love the Mom compartment and that the main zipper opens all the way - no more searching in the deep, dark bag for the lost paci. Great fabric, very sturdy, and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: baby mama

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality just too big for me with only 1 kid. Beautiful design and color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Big bag with great attention to design and detail!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for a "day out with the kid(s)." Plenty of space and pockets in the large compartment, a great mommy section, and good outside pockets. I really like the crumb drain, the grip shoulder strap, and the silver inside lining. I think that JuJuBe is a great company with a great product! Will soon be buying a smaller version to use as my everyday bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper bag I've ever bought. Had this diaper bag for 2 years and still holds up awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in a bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, love the organization!!!!! Love the scarlet petals print! So gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Alisia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my twins and plenty of room with great organization. Well made and a great pattern. The material is soft as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is big but for trips there's a place for everything and it stays in its place! Even if we have another kid, this bag will accommodate both! Can't say enough about it. Very well made and I am brutal with all of our things!
customer_reviews.author: PatioL

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black bag and got a pink and grey one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in NZ a week after ordering it. I love it. Not as big as all the review said. Its just perfect. Cant wait to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: swan michel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, don't care for the solid colors!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag, dislike the look of the solid colored bag. Great quality, ju ju be makes a smart product to keep parents organized. I recommend zippered pouches to keep stuff organized and easily accessible in the bag. I'm going with a printed bag and stroller clips which should be included in this high end bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! I don't think it is too big at all! I love taking everything I can with me and this bag holds it all plus more! The quality is excellent! It's also nice because I also use it for my sons suitcase when we go out of town! I am 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jwash909

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Made with quality fabrics but this bag must weigh at least 4-5 lbs. I have 3 kids to lug around. Don't need a 4th monkey on my back on top of it. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount to move things back & forth to grandparents for babysitting. Also good for longer t
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG
customer_reviews.text: For a mom that likes to always be prepared and carry extras its a perfect bag. I am a mom of 3 all under age 5 and i needed a bag that can fit more than a few diapers and wipes for a newborn. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: DABOOSH007

customer_reviews.title: Great large nappy bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, I bought it for 2 babies in cloth nappies. Ample room and great structure inside bag. Currently have it packed for hospital. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for twins
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is great for twins or more than one child. It has plenty of room and many organized compartments. It is good quality and well built. I took off one star because it's heavy which is my only complaint. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: ymo2000

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and pockets
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and pockets. Price was great, but returning because of the print. It really looks like bacon and I did show it to many family members who assumed the print was called "bacon." So yes, returning and spending a bit more for a more neutral pattern.
customer_reviews.author: CAK0023

customer_reviews.title: Great DB, lots of space and super lightwright
customer_reviews.text: Great DB, lots of space and super lightwright! I'd just add a couple of straps to carry as a backpack and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Murillo

customer_reviews.title: It's a good bag if you carry ALOT of things with you
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag if you carry ALOT of things with you, or if you have more than 1 kid. Otherwise, this bag is too big and wayyyy to heavy I might add. Even with nothing inside, it weighed quite a bit!! Take note!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, I do too but a little to flashy lol
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BIG bag
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag was EXACTLY what I was looking for. It is HUGE and holds everything I need for a toddler and cloth diapered infant for day trips.
customer_reviews.author: HartLink

customer_reviews.title: It has great pockets that help me organize everything so I know ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a big bag but I cloth diaper my baby and we typically leave the house for up to 12 hours at a time so I'm please with the size. It has great pockets that help me organize everything so I know exactly where to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag heaps of room
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag heaps of room ... Only downside is it's too big to carry comfortably on your shoulder for long.
customer_reviews.author: Maree Waterson

customer_reviews.title: Todella hyvä tarkoitukseensa.
customer_reviews.text: Kolmen pienen lapsen äitinä tämä vastaa meidän tarpeita. Tilava ja kätevästi omat tavarat omassa osastossa. Ostin laukun myös ajatellen aikaa jolloin mahdollisesti ei hoitolaukulle ole enää käyttöä mutta uskon että tämä on mainio laukku viikonloppuun tai lentomatkoille tai jopa harrastuksiin. Monesti olkahihna tahtoo valua pois olkapäältä tehden näin laukusta mahdottoman kantaa mutta tämä laukku pysyy olkapäällä. Suosittelen!
customer_reviews.author: Katja Valtanen

customer_reviews.title: It Could Look Better
customer_reviews.text: I had carried a JuJuBe Be All for over 6 years, but I need something bigger. In comes the JuJuBe Be Prepared. Not what I was expecting. I wouldn't say its too big, b/c I loved the extra space, and this print was beautiful, I just thought the bag looked terribly awkward whether full or not. If I am going to spend that kind of money on a bag, it needs to be perfect in ALL ways :-). Though as far as durability goes, you can't beat JuJuBe. My Be All is still pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Hello World

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper bag I've ever had. Well worth the money if you have two or more kids youre packing for
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Graham

customer_reviews.title: It Could Look Better
customer_reviews.text: I had carried a JuJuBe Be All for over 6 years, but I need something bigger. In comes the JuJuBe Be Prepared. Not what I was expecting. I wouldn't say its too big, b/c I loved the extra space, I just thought the bag looked terribly awkward whether full or not. If I am going to spend that kind of money on a bag, it needs to be perfect in ALL ways :-). Though as far as durability goes, you can't beat JuJuBe. My Be All is still pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Hello World

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the handle. I think that the long strap should be adjustable to be a little shorter. It has the two shorter straps but they are too short. There needs to be an inbetween.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bahnsen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just had twins and looked a long time for the perfect diaper bag. I was super excited when I found this bag it looked bright and fun with all the space and organization I need for twins. However when the bag arrived I was very disappointed the color was not true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jedd Yuhas

customer_reviews.title: the perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, the perfect diaper bag. Great time on shipping also.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky for every day use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of it but found it too bulky to carry around. I felt like I was taking my luggage everywhere. I like the company but prefer the smaller sizes. Would be a good weekender bag, though.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Chick

customer_reviews.title: Slightly different from the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I really liked the print, but when I received it, you can see in person there's an orange outline on the bags print that I just didn't care for. Like a burnt orange color. Not for me. I returned and purchased a different print. The bag is perfect size though for 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dadoun

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: More like an oversized lunch box than a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ju Ju be be prepared bag
customer_reviews.text: The item I received contained dry cereal and used baby toys, the bottom metal knobs were scuffed and the bag had black dirt spots on it. The product itself was nice, the condition of it was not.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Reckelberg

product_meta.title: Ju-Ju-Be Be Prepared Diaper Bag, Black/Silver
product_meta.description:
The Ju-Ju-Be Be Prepared Diaper Bag is a smart bag with innovative designs and spacious compartments. Keep yourself ultra-organized with (17) friendly pockets that make it easy to tote along all your daily essentials. Are you an over packer? Do you have more than one in diapers? Twins? How about the perfect bag for overnight trips or the airplane? The largest in our line of diaper bags, the Be Prepared will help you be just that, prepared. The lining is protected with an Agion natural antimicrobial treatment that inhibits and reduces the growth of odor-causing bacteria, mold and mildew. The outer fabric is treated with Teflon fabric protector, making it easy to repel stains and keep it clean. The "mommy" pocket is large enough for smartphones, wallets, keys and other personal items. Inside are (4) pockets with a sunglass holder and a key fob stretch cord. A snap closure pocket is located on the front of the bag and ideal for books. The main zipper pocket is large enough for diapers, wipes, extra clothes and other items. This spacious area also includes (7) smaller pockets with (2) sets of colored tabs to help distinguish different items. The back pocket is designed with crumb drains to keep this area clean and includes a super cushy memory foam changing pad. Bottle pockets with magnetic closure flaps are located on either side of the bag and insulated to keep items hot or cold. The black fabric is accented by silver colored hardware, including luggage feet to keep the bottom of your bag clean when you set it down. This bag is machine washable and measures 18.5-inches by 14-inches by 6.5-inches in size. The Ju-Ju-Be Be Prepared Diaper Bag comes with a 90-day limited warranty to protect against manufacturing defects.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ju Ju Be's BePrepared is part of the premiere collection. Are you an over packer, do you have more than one in diapers. Twins. How about the perfect bag for overnight trips or the airplane. BePrepared features two exterior insulated bottle pockets, a structured bottom with luggage feet, full zip-down mommy pocket for super access, a picture pocket to keep photos handy when bragging to friends, tote handles that can be tucked away and hidden when not in use, and an adjustable shoulder strap with a memory foam pad and grippy textile underneath. The unique main zipper closure system makes for easy access while color coded tabs let you know which pocket is for which child. This bag has all of Ju Ju Be's favorite features from crumb drains to TEFLON. Measures 18.5" x 14" x 6.5".
feature_bullets: Ultimate diaper bag for an over packer, mommy with twins or an overnight trip
(17) smart friendly pockets making it easy to keep ultra-organized
Includes Teflon treated outer fabric, Agion antimicrobial protected lining and 3M Thinsulate in the insulated bottle pockets
Adjustable straps, with memory foam in the shoulder pad and included changing pad
Comes with a 90-day limited warranty against manufacturing defects

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars66 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
